synopsis.text: This exciting anime follows the adventures of Karin, a junior high school student who transforms into a superhero pig named Buurin. One day, Karin encounters a hungry piglet on her way to school, which turns out to be Prince Tonrariano III from the planet Booringo. In gratitude for her kindness, Tonrariano III grants Karin the ability to transform into Buurin, a flying super-pig. However, Karin is not thrilled about her new porcine identity and longs to be a beautiful superheroine instead. The King of Booringo promises Karin that she can become her ideal heroine if she collects 100 magical pearls by helping people in need. With each act of kindness, Karin earns a pearl and becomes closer to realizing her dream. As Buurin, she saves the day and captures the hearts of everyone around her, all while keeping her true identity a secret. Will Karin be able to collect all 100 pearls and become the heroine she's always wanted to be? Only time will tell in this heartwarming and action-packed anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
